This template describes the usage of the M-138. In the component's settings, you can select what should happen to invalid characters not being supported by the M-138, whether to encrypt or decrypt, how to handle capitalization and the format of the key. In the component's visualization, you can see how the strips of the M-138 look like in the actual device.
